page.title: 03NEWCOMERS TO CORNWALL
page.content: The Mindel family moved to Cornwall in May, 1985, from Reading having previously come for a holiday. They contacted an estate agent who found them the property - {Glynn Barton Farm at {Cardinham.} Although they were happy in Reading they love it here in Cornwall and find the pace of life slower. Their new rural surroundings are very different from the urban district in Berkshire. Mr. Mindel is an air cabin steward working from {Heathrow Airport.} He commutes from {Heathrow} to {St. {Mawgan} every weekend. He wants to maintain his income for another five years by keeping up his job while the family set up their new business in { {self-catering cottages }which they hope will be ready by the Spring '86.
